text: Richard Erwin Rood (October 8, 1980â€”April 20, 1999), was an American professional wrestler. He is best known by his ring name "Ravishing" Rick Rude and wrestled for the professional wrestling promotions World Championship Wrestling (WCW), Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) and World Wrestling Federation (WWF) from 1987 to 1998. In his wrestling career he was a one-time WWF Intercontinental Champion and won numerous championships in WCW and ECW. ==Other websites== *WWE profile Category:1958 births Category:1999 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Minnesota Category:WWE Hall of Fame
title: Rick Rude
